question: You're gonna be seeing a lot of me. You're sure you don't mind?
response: It's good what you're doing.

question: Do you know how to get there?
response: It's right around the corner.

question: Did you understand question number three?
response: I was totally in the dark.

question: Then it's the worst kind?
response: They're all good, sir.

question: Do you like my new outfit?
response: You shouldn't be allowed to buy clothes.

question: Perhaps it can be improved?
response: No problem!

question: Was she angry?
response: She was so mad she was spitting bullets.

question: Did you like it?
response: I was glad when it was over.

question: Are there more like you?
response: Dead. All dead. Long time.

question: But didn't those friends of yours tell you what formula they usually give the baby?
response: Actually they had to leave unexpectedly. They had to catch a plane...

question: Would he fire me?
response: He's all bark and no bite.

question: Didn't he work for the Church?
response: Almost exclusively.

question: You weren't supposed to follow me, were you?
response: Sorry. My fault.

question: You mean I pretend I have a mom?
response: You can do that, can't you?

question: Can your grandmother hear?
response: She can hear a pin drop a mile away.

question: Is the groom taller than the bride?
response: He is as tall as a giraffe.

question: You could join to help at the activity centre.
response: I don't have that much extra time.

question: Are you guys all right in there?
response: We're fine.

question: Do you think I should attend the interview?
response: Do you want to be a failure for the rest of your life?

question: Are you going to talk to Mark?
response: I have a bone to pick with Mark.

question: Should I pay any attention to Sam?
response: He is nutty as a fruitcake.

question: You're leaving?
response: It has been a pleasure my queen.

question: It's bad isn't it?
response: We should get you to the doctor.

question: Is he available?
response: He's all tied up in the staff meeting.

question: We're supposed to believe that?
response: That's right.

question: Are you going to keep your part time job the next semester at the biology laboratory?
response: One semester as lab assistant is enough.

question: Did you have a good time at the party?
response: It was gas.

question: You wanna give up now? When we're this close to reaching our dream?
response: This was your dream. You'll manage.

question: Aren't you scared?
response: Well, that's just fine.

question: Are you rich?
response: We don't have two cents to rub together.

question: Have you seen my watch?
response: I will take a look for it around my house.

question: Did I see you with Jane at the supermarket?
response: We just bumped into each other.

question: Did you clean your room?! The cleaning woman is coming today!
response: Then why do I need to clean?

question: Getting into trouble a little early today, aren't we Aladdin?
response: Trouble? You're only in trouble if you get caught.

question: Are you okay?
response: Is official. My powers are kaput.

question: Are you with me?
response: To the death!

question: Is this heaven?
response: It's Iowa.

question: Did they like the proposal we put together?
response: It looks like it's back to the drawing board.

question: Is he fat?
response: He is skinny enough to jump through a keyhole.

question: You've seen rain before... right?
response: We don't get out much.

question: Do you ever throw anything away?
response: Someday I'm gonna get married and I'm going to need all this stuff.

question: Are you able to carry the box?
response: It is as light as a feather.

question: You were a smoker?
response: Two packs a day.

question: You don't want to sing this song?
response: I'm not into it right now.

question: Are you alone?
response: Dan and I had a fight and he split.

question: You don't mind taking care of that dog?
response: It is a labor of love.

question: Can you sit with me to have a look at these outlines?
response: I am tied up at this moment.

question: He still dead?
response: Far as I know.

question: Is this where I get travelling papers?
response: It would be if we let you travel which we don't so it isn't.

question: Shall I wear this one?
response: It is gorgeous.

question: Oh, so this is the best kind?
response: It's the cheapest.

question: That is a nice jacket. Did you buy it recently?
response: I bought it long back. I was just waiting for the weather to cool down.

question: Do you think you can give me a ride home?
response: A friend in need is a friend indeed.

question: Are you tired?
response: I'm so tired I could sleep for a million years.

question: Is Peter like you?
response: We're just as different as night and day.

question: Are they gonna try to eat our brains?!
response: I think you'll be safe.

question: Were they excited?
response: You could feel a ripple of excitement.

question: Was that easy to negotiate?
response: That is as easy as shooting fish in a barrel.

question: Is it true you rescued a human from drowing?
response: Daddy, I had to...

question: Does he come to attend the meditation class?
response: Do pigs fly?

question: She's not gonna eat me right?
response: You're too skinny.

question: Is he smart?
response: His brain is the size of a pea.

question: Is he currently employed?
response: He's... he's going through a bad patch at the moment. But it's not his fault.

question: Did you talk to Kathy?
response: My manager talked me out of it.

question: Do you want to go to the lecture tonight in the science auditorium? It is done by a guide who lived in Antartica for a decade.
response: It is no kidding. I am writing a report on Antarctica in my geography class. Maybe I would get some good information to add to it.

question: Did you tell her about the dress?
response: I just bit my tongue.

question: Do you like that theory?
response: Sounds good. Let's move on.

question: You want to try?
response: We can ask for nothing better.

question: Are you a very good tennis player?
response: I'm above average.

question: Is he a fast runner?
response: He runs like the wind!

question: Did it rain yesterday?
response: We've been having quite a dry spell lately.

question: Is the game still on?
response: It's all over.

question: You really believe I'm ready?
response: You are, Po.

question: You remember?
response: Not by choice.

question: Have I done something to offend you?
response: I like all you Navy boys.

question: Don't you ever think about having a family?
response: Right now, you're my family.

question: Is that a big mall?
response: That mall is large enough to have its own zip code.

question: Are you going to talk to Mark?
response: I want to get this off my chest.

question: Do you know him?
response: I wish I did.

question: Are the shops open at night?
response: New York is the city that never sleeps.

question: Do you think I should finish it fast?
response: Time is ticking away.

question: Are you going for the party?
response: Is the pope Catholic?

question: You're both comin', right?
response: We're already here.

question: Should I go to their house?
response: It is a den of iniquity.

question: Is this shoe comfortable?
response: These dress shoes are killing me.

question: Have you eve seen anything so wonderful in your entire life?
response: Wow, cool! But, err, what is it?

question: Do you think you got an “a” on the test?
response: Do chickens have lips?

question: Are you sure that I should do it?
response: You've got to do what you've got to do.

question: Do you thing I should buy an iPhone?
response: I think you can get more bang for your buck with other brands of smartphones.

question: Do you know how to play the violin?
response: Do cats meow?

question: You have trouble sleeping?
response: I get headaches.

question: Should we go fishing?
response: Fishing is off season.

question: Did they speak in turns?
response: One after the other.

question: Are you Zuria?
response: He's inside.

question: You mean like, hide and seek?
response: Perfect! Hide and seek in the rain.

question: C-can you can you unlock it?
response: Not in a million years. But it wouldn't matter.

question: Oh. So, um, I should... stop talking?
response: If you can.

question: You want to do this to the whole world?
response: So the whole world will be exactly how I want.

question: But that's going a bit too far, don't you think?
response: Indubitably.

question: Is Marci grumpy?
response: He's as gentle as a lamb.

question: Do you need a a day off?
response: I can start immediately. Fill me in on the task.

question: Is the dress perfect?
response: It fits like a glove.

question: Did I make a good bet?
response: You backed the wrong horse.

question: Is it for an artist?
response: It's for an accountant.

question: You think the cops have our phone bugged?
response: I don't think that's legal.

question: Does she always cry like that?
response: She's usually very sweet...

question: Does he have work?
response: He is as busy as a bee.

question: Don't you stay for a nightcap?
response: I've gotta get up early.

question: Are you going to spend your vacation in New York this year?
response: Actually I have a different destination in mind.

question: You don't add some kind of special sauce or something?
response: Don't have to. To make something special, you just have to believe it's special.

question: And then Batman showed up?
response: He saved all our lives, Jim.

question: Are you dressed up to go to bingo?
response: Ahh, I just wanna look nice.

question: This, so, this is your new job opportunity?
response: You're gonna like this.

question: Is that a snake?
response: Belt! New and improved! It's even self-tightening. Ow!

question: Have you finished reading what Chris wrote yet?
response: I read it last night.

question: Do you want this so badly?
response: It is everything.

question: Was Benny emotional?
response: Benny always wears his heart on his sleeve.

question: Did he assist you?
response: He helped me finish my paper

question: I can't believe how much similar you both look. Are you related?
response: People are always assuming that we are related.

question: Did you argue with the clerk?
response: I was really angry, but I managed to hold my tongue.

question: Is it too much?
response: It's all great.

question: I've heard it is the worst place to go to school, is it?
response: It's not as bad as all that.

question: Can you open this?
response: No way.

question: I beg your pardon. Are you ill?
response: I hope not.

question: Is there a bus I can get to the station.
response: You can't rely on it.

question: Did he like the college?
response: He said he had the time of his life.

question: Are you sure that's the plan?
response: You bet that's the plan!

question: Heh. That's a joke, right?
response: What's a joke?

question: But you're saying, you're a daughter of Eve?
response: Well, my mum's name is Helen...

question: Fred, is there something you want to tell me about the lodge meeting?
response: I don't wanna think about it.

question: Want a piece of chocolate?
response: I'm allergic to it.

question: Is he generous?
response: He would give you the shirt off his back.

question: Do I have to attend this interview?
response: Do you want to be a success in this world?

question: Can he play the violin?
response: Can a pig fly?

question: Aren't you suppose to be in bed?
response: We couldn't sleep.

question: Is the place clean?
response: It's a jungle out there.

question: Am I late?
response: No time to talk.

question: Can you tell my future from these stars?
response: The stars don't tell the future, donkey. They tell stories.

question: I noticed that you have not installed that program on your computer. Shall I sit with you with the instruction manual?
response: That would be great. You need a PhD to understand it.

question: You mean you don't know who she is?
response: No way.

question: Mind if I leave my umbrella here in the hallway?
response: Not at all. But first shake it outside. Would you?

question: Should I water your plants while you are away?
response: Thanks for the offer, but Mark already said that he will have an eye on them.

question: You... you actually believe her?
response: Well don't you?

question: Have you seen them recently?
response: I haven't seen them in ages.

question: Could you understand the sketch?
response: It is as clear as mud.

question: You heard what I said?
response: Every word.

question: Aren't you getting ready?
response: We've lost our ride, Miriam.

question: Should I go straight at this intersection?
response: Hang a left.

question: They grow up so fast, don't they?
response: Too fast.

question: Am I better than your sister?
response: You can't hold a candle to my sister.

question: That's what you're afraid of isn't it?
response: You bet I am.

question: Could they compete against online platforms?
response: They were fighting a losing battle.

question: Are you going to tell him what you think?
response: You bet your boots I am.

question: You brought the money?
response: Right here.
